## NS.clearPort() method

Clear data from a port.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
clearPort(handle: number): void;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description    |
| --------- | ------ | -------------- |
| handle    | number | Port to clear. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

RAM cost: 0 GB

Deleta all data from the underlying queue.
